result.arabic_text: رَّبُّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا فَٱعۡبُدۡهُ وَٱصۡطَبِرۡ لِعِبَٰدَتِهِۦۚ هَلۡ تَعۡلَمُ لَهُۥ سَمِيّٗا
result.translation: 65. Usuk qaranwaa kee baaxooy ken nammayih fanal taniimih Rabbik kaa uqbudaay kay qibaadal isbir Nabiyow, kaa celtaah kay migaq lem maay taaxige? maleey.
